Description: Jackson Pro Series Misha Mansoor Juggernaut HT7FM Oceanburst Guitar Mint 2017 SKU: SS2502 Brand: Jackson Condition: Used Body Type: Solid String Configuration: 7 String Dexterity: Right-Handed Body Color: Oceanburst Country of Manufacture: Indonesia Model: Pro Series Mansoor Juggernaut HT7FM MPN: 2914007585 UPC: 885978773329 STREETSOUNDS EST 1988 IS PROUD TO BE AN AUTHORIZED JACKSON DEALER:JACKSON PRO SERIES MISHA MANSOOR JUGGERNAUT HT7FMPHOTO OF ACTUAL GUITARCOLOR: OCEANBURSTMINT CONDITIONPN: 2914007585NO DENTS, NO DINGSPERFECT NECK, PERFECT FRETSSN: ICJ1707947GUITAR WEIGHT: 8LBS. 4OZ.SET UP1 YEAR WARRANTYFREE SHIPPING IN CONTINENTAL U.S. Djent forefather and speed demon Misha Mansoor has gained widespread acclaim as the mastermind behind the axe-centric progressive metal band Periphery. Hes known to impress the most discerning of metal fans with his steadfast, fleet-fingered technique, and his personally designed collection of Jackson signature Juggernaut instruments is sure to set any shredders tone ablaze. The Pro Juggernaut HT7FM features a 26.5-scale length, basswood body with a striking flame maple top, one-piece bolt-on maple speed neck with graphite reinforcement for rock-solid stability and wrap-around heel for comfort, 16 flat radius ebony fingerboard with 24 jumbo frets, offset dot inlays, Luminlay side-dots, and heel-mounted truss rod adjustment wheel. Not willing to sacrifice tone, Mansoor spent considerable time working with Jackson to develop new, killer-sounding Jackson MM1 pickups, which can be shaped with a master volume and master tone control with push/pull select and five-way blade switch. Also features a Jackson HT7 string-through-body hardtail bridge, Jackson die-cast locking tuners, black hardware and Jackson 4x3 (4 over, 3 under) AT-1 headstock.
